# NSPickerTouchBarItem.ControlRepresentation.expanded

**Case**

The system displays the control and all of its options directly.

## Declaration

```swift
case expanded
```

## Display styles

- **NSPickerTouchBarItem.ControlRepresentation.automatic**: The system dynamically changes the display mode based on the available space.
- **NSPickerTouchBarItem.ControlRepresentation.collapsed**: The system displays the control’s options through a popover.
